title: Account Details
description: Commonly used organizational attributes for a B2B account such as number of employees, market segment, industry, rating, tickersymbol etc.

xdm:organizationType.title: Type of Organizations
xdm:organizationType.description: Label describing the type of organization

xdm:numberOfEmployees.title: Number of employees
xdm:numberOfEmployees.description: The number of employees at the organization.

xdm:annualRevenue.title: Annual Revenue
xdm:annualRevenue.description: Estimated amount of annual revenue of the organization.

xdm:industry.title: Industry
xdm:industry.description: The industry that this organization is a part of. This is a free-form field, and it is advisable to use a structured value for queries or to use the `xdm:classifier` property.

xdm:website.title: Website URL
xdm:website.description: The URL of the organization's website.

xdm:marketSegment.title: Market segment
xdm:marketSegment.description: The named market segment that the organization participates in. This is a free-form field, and it is advisable to use a structured value for queries or to use the `xdm:identifier` property.

xdm:rating.title: Rating
xdm:rating.description: The calculated score or star rating for this organization. `1` indicates the maximum possible rating, `0` the minimum possible rating.

xdm:tickerSymbol.title: Ticker Symbol
xdm:tickerSymbol.description: The stock market symbol for this account. Maximum of 20 characters.

xdm:logoUrl.title: Logo URL
xdm:logoUrl.description: Path to be combined with the URL of a Salesforce instance (for example, https://yourInstance.salesforce.com/) to generate a URL to request the social network profile image associated with the account. Generated URL returns an HTTP redirect (code 302) to the social network profile image for the account.

xdm:linkedinPageUrl.title: Linkedinin Page URL
xdm:linkedinPageUrl.description: Website link to the Linkedin account of the account

xdm:twitterHandleUrl.title: Twitter handle URL
xdm:twitterHandleUrl.description: Website link to the twitter handle of the account

xdm:facebookPageUrl.title: Facebook Page URL
xdm:facebookPageUrl.description: Website link to the Facebook account of the account

xdm:NAICSCode.title: NAICS Code
xdm:NAICSCode.description: A NAICS (pronounced NAKES) Code is a classification within the North American Industry Classification System.

xdm:SICCode.title: SIC Code
xdm:SICCode.description: The Standard Industrial Classification (SIC) are four-digit codes that categorize the industries that companies belong to based on their business activities.

xdm:NAICSDescription.title: NAICS Description
xdm:NAICSDescription.description: A brief description of an organization’s line of business, based on its NAICS code.

xdm:SICDescription.title: SIC Description
xdm:SICDescription.description: A brief description of an organization’s line of business, based on its SIC code.

xdm:DUNSNumber.title: Dun & Bradstreet D-U-N-S Number
xdm:DUNSNumber.description: The Dun & Bradstreet D-U-N-S Number is a non-indicative, nine-digit number assigned to each business location in the Dun & Bradstreet database having a unique, separate, and distinct operation, and is maintained solely by Dun & Bradstreet.

xdm:companyProductAndServices.title: Company Product and Services
xdm:companyProductAndServices.description: Product and Services the Company is dealing or doing business in.
